incidents.name: Issues Creating New Frontline Instances on Twilio Accounts

incident_updates.body: New account creation for Frontline in Twilio console is operating normally at this time. This incident is resolved.

New account creation for Frontline in Twilio console is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue causing problems creating new Frontline instances on Twilio Accounts and are working to deploy a fix. 

Current workaround to create new Frontline instances is to use the following URL:
https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/frontline?frameUrl=%2Fconsole%2Ffrontline%2Foverview%3Fx-target-region%3Dus1. 

We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate customer reports of issues creating new Frontline instances on Twilio accounts. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

While we investigate, a workaround to create new Frontline instances is to use the following URL:
https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/frontline?frameUrl=%2Fconsole%2Ffrontline%2Foverview%3Fx-target-region%3Dus1

We are investigating customer reports of issues creating new Frontline instances on Twilio accounts. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with creation of new accounts in console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating Issues With Creation of New Accounts

incident_updates.body:
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with New Account creation. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Unable to Preserve Sender ID to All networks in Chile resulting to Inbound SMS failures to a Subset of Twilio Chile Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: The issue affecting inbound SMS delivery delays when sending messages to a subset of Chile phone numbers has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time.

We are observing recovery in inbound SMS delivery delays when sending messages to a subset of Chile phone numbers. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We currently observe an issue in preserving sender IDs when sending SMS to all networks in Chile from a subset of Twilio Chile phone numbers resulting to Inbound SMS failures. incidents.name: Support Service Disruption on Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Our engineers investigated a customer impact of a retroactive issue with Support Service Disruption on Twilio Console that was degraded for 30 minutes between 3:10 PM and 3:40 PM Pacific Time on 01/04/2023.  During this period, customers may have experienced issues with appropriately submitting tickets, chat with agents, view their ticket history, or see their current support plan during the outage window.

incidents.name: Call Logs, Call Deletes and Billing not Accessible for Customers on Programmable and Trunking Calls

incident_updates.body: Call Logs, Call Deletes and Billing access has been resolved and operating normally at this time.

Call Logs, Call Deletes and Billing in On Programmable Voice and SIP Trunking are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor to ensure the service stability. Well provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Call Logs, Call Deletes and Billing in On Programmable Voice and SIP Trunking are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still seeing a degraded performance for call logs, call deletes and billing for Programmable and Trunking Calls. Customers may experience issues viewing their Call Logs and Billing not Accessible for Customers on Programmable and Trunking Calls. Well provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are seeing a degraded performance for call logs, call deletes and billing for Programmable and Trunking Calls. Customers may experience issues viewing their Call Logs and Billing not Accessible for Customers on Programmable and Trunking Calls. incidents.name: The Support Plans Page in the Console Is Now Fully Operational

incident_updates.body: The support plans page in the console was degraded for approximately 30 minutes between 3:10:59PM and 3:43:03 PM PT on 01/04/2023. During that time, customers were not able to access the page or upgrade their support plan. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: All systems are operational

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the issue affecting the support plans page and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

incidents.name: Delays in Bulk Export Tool via Twilio Rest API

incident_updates.body: Delays in Bulk Export Tool via Twilio Rest API has been resolved.

Bulk Export Tool is now operating normally and customer should be able to use the functionality now.  We will continue to monitor for system stability. Well provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate elevated latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Bulk exports. Customers may experience inaccurate estimated completion times. All new and existing bulk exports will not be completed until the issue is resolved. We recommend waiting to submit any new requests until the issue is resolved. 

Our engineering team is actively working on this issue and we will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate elevated latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Bulk exports. Customers may experience inaccurate estimated completion times. All new and existing bulk exports will not be completed until the issue is resolved. We recommend waiting to submit any new requests until the issue is resolved. 

Our engineering team is actively working on this issue and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating elevated latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Bulk exports. Customers may experience inaccurate estimated completion times. Our engineering team is actively working on the issue and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
